name: Candy-19
description:
Clear the virus from the town! 

Trick or Treat? Not in the word of Candy-19. There is evil to be slain and virus to be removed. Go to each house (multiple times?) to get candy to clear the town of the virus.

Controls

MOVE:  [A] & [D]

JUMP: [SPACE]

Interact: [E]

Attack: [SHIFT]

Dance: [X]

Twerk?? [T]

The Team

Developer: Jake Gift - (Elite Cow)

Artist/ Story Writer: Nathaniel Falcon - (Constant_Hat)
